descriptions.description: Generating polyhedral quadrangulations of the projective plane...153-183 On the generalized Oberwolfach problem...67-78 Vertex transitive graphs G with χD(G) > χ(G) and small automorphism group...311-318 Distant sum distinguishing index of graphs with bounded minimum degree...37-49 Direct product of automorphism groups of digraphs...89-101 Block allocation of a sequential resource...79-88 On graphs with exactly two positive eigenvalues...319-347 Graph characterization of fully indecomposable nonconvertible (0, 1)-matrices with minimal number of ones...141-151 Total positivity of Toeplitz matrices of recursive hypersequences...125-139 A family of multigraphs with large palette index...115-124 A diagram associated with the subconstituent algebra of a distance-regular graph...185-202 Tetrahedral and pentahedral cages for discs...255-270 The orientable genus of the join of a cycle and a complete graph...223-253 Types of triangle in Hamiltonian triangulations and an application to domination and k-walks...51-66 Integral regular net-balanced signed graphs with vertex degree at most four...103-114 On identities of Watson type...277-290 New methods for finding minimum genus embeddings of graphs on orientable and non-orientable surfaces...1-35 Logarithms of a binomial series: A Stirling number approach...271-275 String C-group representations of alternating groups...291-310 Distance-regular Cayley graphs with small valency...203-222 Symmetries of Discrete Objects (SODO 2020) Combinatorics around the q-Onsager algebra Twin Journals
